name: Toverblade
description:
Toverblade is a magical deck-building strategy game. Train your heroes, explore a dangerous world, and overcome wolves, giants, and ice golems on your way to a mysterious fortress.

Features
  • recruit knights, archers, and wizards 🧙
  • collect various cards and alter your play style 🃏
  • over 90 different items to collect 🗡️
  • over 30 enemies to encounter 👹
  • 10 unique areas to explore ⛰️
